description:
Mini Monster: Ryzen 9 7945HX + RTX 4070 Super in TINY PC Build! (1440p/4K Gaming)
Unleash the beast within your desk!  In this video, we conquer the challenge of squeezing a powerhouse PC into a mini ITX case using the revolutionary Minisforum BD790i Motherboard.  This bad boy packs a punch with the unstoppable AMD Ryzen 9 7945HX 16-core CPU and the blazing-fast ASUS Dual NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4070 Super graphics card.  Get ready for jaw-dropping 1440p and even smooth 4K gaming in a whisper-quiet, ultra-compact form factor.
Here's what you'll get:
* ** Tiny PC,¬†HUGE Performance:** Witness the magic of squeezing desktop-grade power into a mini ITX build.
* Next-Gen Powerhouse:¬†Experience the raw performance of the Ryzen 9 7945HX CPU and RTX 4070 Super graphics card.
* Crystal-Clear Gameplay:¬†Enjoy silky-smooth gameplay at 1440p and even 4K resolutions.
* Peace and Quiet:¬†Conquer games without the roar of traditional gaming PCs.
* ‚ú®¬†Compact & Stylish:¬†Showcase your mini mo
title: We Used The New BD790i To Build A Powerful Small Foot Print PC! AIO 16 Core Mini ITX
